Plot: Retired C.I.A. agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.
Title: RED 2
Writer: Jon Hoeber, Erich Hoeber, Warren Ellis (characters), Cully Hamner (characters)
Actors: Bruce Willis, John Malkovich, Mary-Louise Parker, Helen Mirren
tomatoConsensus: While it's still hard to argue with its impeccable cast or the fun they often seem to be having, Red 2 replaces much of the goofy fun of its predecessor with empty, over-the-top bombast.
